name: FAREWELL SEN (itch)
description:
After hearing a SOS call on the radio Soot stops his car
and begins looking for the broadcast station it came from
but what he finds is far from what he bargained for.

A freeware turn based RPG inspired by old handheld games about finding your way through a small town under attack!

also my first game ever so dont expect anything to insane lol

SOUNDTRACK DONE BY: @thenatbird on Twitter

EXTRA ART DONE BY: @Iwannahugaalien on Twitter

All other credits in the files/end of the game!
